name: GoobQuest
description:
Goob quest is my first original video game developed in unity. Please download this game if you want to support a small indie developer. In the game, you attempt to defeat the evil goob king. Please report any bugs in the comments ;).

[Patch Note: Version 1.2]

Fixed miss in controls. (Added: "e = activate warp crystal")

To implement this patch into your game instance. Please delete the game from your hard drive and reinstall the fixed version.

Thank You :)
